description: Try our easy to follow Curried Quinoa & Tofu recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tofu stir-fry,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Vegan,Quick & easy lunch,Tofu,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Curried Quinoa & Tofu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g classic tofu (lightly mashed with a fork)

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat a frying pan over medium heat. Add oil and spring onion and cook for 1 minute. Add spinach and cook for 2 minutes or until wilted. Add turmeric and curry powder and cook for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add tofu, tamari and cooked quinoa, and stir to combine. Cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Season well, then scatter over parsley and chilli to serve.
